00025 #ifndef _PASSENGER_BACKTRACES_SERVER_H_
00026 #define _PASSENGER_BACKTRACES_SERVER_H_
00027 
00028 #include <oxt/thread.hpp>
00029 #include <oxt/backtrace.hpp>
00030 #include "MessageServer.h"
00031 
00032 namespace Passenger {
00033 
00034 using namespace std;
00035 
00036 /**
00037  * A MessageServer handler for reporting the backtraces of all running oxt::threads.
00038  */
00039 class BacktracesServer: public MessageServer::Handler {
00040 public:
00041         virtual bool processMessage(MessageServer::CommonClientContext &commonContext,
00042                                     MessageServer::ClientContextPtr &handlerSpecificContext,
00043                                     const vector<string> &args)
00044         {
00045                 TRACE_POINT();
00046                 if (args[0] == "backtraces") {
00047                         UPDATE_TRACE_POINT();
00048                         commonContext.requireRights(Account::INSPECT_BACKTRACES);
00049                         commonContext.channel.writeScalar(oxt::thread::all_backtraces());
00050                         return true;
00051                 } else {
00052                         return false;
00053                 }
00054         }
00055 };
00056 
00057 } // namespace Passenger
00058 
00059 #endif /* _PASSENGER_BACKTRACES_SERVER_H_ */
